title: Online Journalism Practical Skills Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device proficiency and introductory journalism concepts
context.additional_context: Practical job-centered education for working professionals, constructing a field-intensive learning environment through online/offline collaboration

learning_goals: Learners can write and publish three or more articles using online journalism platforms (blogs, SNS, etc.).
Learners can determine the credibility of information with 80% or higher accuracy using digital source evaluation tools.
Learners can complete two or more content creation projects with peer learners using online collaboration tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
